definition: selected as the best, an exclusive group of people, choose
details:
adjective
- selected as the best
= example: selected as the best
= synonyms: elite
- elected but not yet installed in office
noun
- an exclusive group of people
= example: an exclusive group of people
= synonyms: chosen
verb
- choose
= example: choose
- select by a vote for an office or membership
= example: select by a vote for an office or membership
